entry.title: Vim Plugins
entry.content:
vundle

Introduction
vim 사용자를 위한 플러그인 매니저 vundle 을 소개 합니다.

Install
gmarik/vundle – GitHub

Basic Commands
:help vundle :BundleList # shows installed bundle list ``` sh install new bundle :BundleSearch

press ‘i’ to install selected an item

and

:BundleInstall `` don't forget addingBundle ‘bundleName’in the.vimrc`file.

sh update bundle :BundleInstall! sh delete bundle :BundleClean # deletes bundles which are not listed on .vimrc

``` sh install :BundleSearch Align # and install

align with separator ‘=’

:‘<,’>Align =

:BundleSearch Markdown-syntax

:BundleSearch closingtag.vim # Ctlr+– to create a matching closing tag

:BundleSearch bufexplorer.zip

:BundleSearch snipMate

:BundleSearch AutoClose

:BundleSearch ZoomWin # <c-w-o> to toggle current window zoom ```
